properties.displayName: Creation of an WerFault.exe in Unusual Folder
properties.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "\\WerFault.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\wer.dll") and (not((FolderPath contains "\\System32\\" or FolderPath contains "\\SysWOW64\\" or FolderPath contains "\\WinSxS\\")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects WerFault copoed to a suspicious folder, which could be a sign of WerFault DLL hijacking
